thread.title: Seven people shot during Martin Luther King Jr. celebration at northwest Miami-Dade park
thread.title_full: Seven people shot during Martin Luther King Jr. celebration at northwest Miami-Dade park - Orlando Sentinel

author: orlandosentinel.com
title: Seven people shot during Martin Luther King Jr. celebration at northwest Miami-Dade park
text:
Gunfire erupted Monday afternoon in a Northwest Miami-Dade park where hundreds gathered after the annual Martin Luther King Jr. parade in Liberty City.
Seven people — including two adults and five minors — were shot and several more were injured during the stampede to get out of Martin Luther King Jr. Memorial Park, 6100 NW 32nd Ct., according to police. The shooting took place around 4 p.m., about two hours after the parade finished. Families had gathered in the park for a post-parade celebration. 
Go to Herald.com  for the complete report.
